head.title: Software using CDK
head.summary: This page contains a list of programs that use (partly) CDK.

section.title: Software using CDK
Jmol
section.para: Jmol uses CDK for reading CML files only at this moment.

section.title: JCPCDK
section.para: JCPCDK is the next generation JChemPaint and is complete build upon CDK.
If your CDK using software is missing from this list, please send an email to cdk-devel@lists.sf.net.
